overview: The street vendor Zeinhom sings in amusement parks and weddings but fails to achieve anything. He finds a bag of money and the composer Hassabo, who he adopts artistically, convinces him to use the money to buy what he needs and then return it to its owner later. Zeinhom who achieves fame and money, is later surprised by the death of the owner of the bag. However, he gets to know his widow Zubaydah and his daughter, Wafa, who gets very attached to him.
title: أولاد حظ
